G

generateCommonResource() - Method in class bridge.toolkit.commands.SCOBuilder
Generates a common 'resource' element that contains all of the files in the View Application and adds a dependency element for the RES-common-files to all resource elements that have scormType = 'sco'.
generateLaunchableFile() - Method in class bridge.toolkit.commands.SCOBuilder
Generates a unique htm file for each 'resource' element that has scormType = 'sco' found in the imsmanifest.xml file and applies the unique htm file name to the 'href' values for each of the SCO 'resource' elements.
generateListFile(File) - Method in class bridge.toolkit.commands.MobileBuilder
Generates a JavaScript file that is used to navigate between the data modules in the mobile output.
generateListFile() - Method in class bridge.toolkit.commands.SCOBuilder
Generates a JavaScript file that is used to navigate between the data modules inside of each SCO.
generateMobilePages(File, String) - Method in class bridge.toolkit.commands.MobileBuilder
Parse the SCPM file for the list of files in each scoEntry to create the individual mobile app pages.
getDoc(File) - Static method in class bridge.toolkit.commands.S1000DConverter
Create the DOM from the file
getDoc(File) - Method in class bridge.toolkit.util.XMLParser
Parses a File object and returns a JDOM Document object.
getMedia() - Method in class bridge.toolkit.util.DMParser
Gets the map of the DMs that reference the ICNs and the list of ICNs that are referenced in each DM.
getResourceHref(String, String) - Static method in class bridge.toolkit.commands.PreProcess
Finds the file that is referenced in a 'href' attribute associated with a given 'resource' element in imsmanifest.xml file.
getSourceFiles(String) - Static method in class bridge.toolkit.commands.S1000DConverter
Retrieves all of the files in a specified directory and returns them in a list.
getSourceFiles(String) - Static method in class bridge.toolkit.util.URNMapper
Retrieves all of the files in a specified directory and returns them in a list.
gettingDmfilename(Node) - Static method in class bridge.toolkit.commands.S1000DConverter
Receive the node with the refdm, returns the dm file name
getXMLString(Node) - Static method in class bridge.toolkit.commands.S1000DConverter
Return the node's content in string
